summary: Jack is Back And Ready To Kick Ass! Based On Jack Nickolson Performance in The Shining Let Him Become Your Ally Destroy Everyone
descriptionHtml:
Jack Torrance is Back
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61120-4-1419723608.jpg[/img]
Ready To Kick Ass With Jack Check Him Out At The Bannered Mare In Whiterun-




[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61120-3-1419723270.jpg[/img]
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61120-1-1419723771.jpg[/img]
 Able To A Summon A Unique Evil Right Before You As Jack Uses His Evil Slaves To Fight For Him Warning They Do Shout!!!
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61120-5-1419723608.jpg[/img]

Master Of Duel Blades, Bow, Spells, And Shouts!!! Warning Very High Level 

[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61120-1-1419755939.jpg[/img]
its Time To Party With Jack!

[img]http://www.quotesworthrepeating.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/12/Heres-Johnny.jpg[/img]
Works Fine With Any Mod 
You Need Dragonborn And Dawnguard
Show Your Support If You Like This
Check Out My Other Mods!!
The Best And Strongest Followers On Nexus Thats guaranteed
Feel Free To Share Your Adventures with Me With Photo's, Video's, And Ideas!

Have Fun
author: XMarioAscended
